The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 29 October is 818,759 (1,454.6 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 24 October, there were 127,172 new confirmed cases (225.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 17 October, there were 99,736 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 28% ( 27,436 extra cases).
